title: MRSOOL | SDE 2 | Gurgaon
content:

Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: Fintech Startup
Date of the Offer: 2024
Company: Mrsool
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Gurgaon, India
Salary: INR 20,00,000
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 20lacs
Benefits: NIL


Question: Guys should I join or not? Not much information online
[Glassdoor ratings are very bad]
I have heard that a lot of senior managment has left recently. Also new management has lots of indian managers who are very toxic , do micromanagment and treat engineers like slav*s.

title: SDE 2 Offers | need help
content:
Education: B.Tech CSE from Tier-3
Years of Experience: 2.7 years
Current company: MNC Product based(Its my second company)
Current compensation:
Base - 16 LPA
Bonus - 7%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 17.1 LPA

Company: PayPal
Title/Level: Software Engineer 2
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 24 LPA
Stock bonus: 6 LPA(per year)
Bonus: 10 %
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 32.4 LPA

Counter offer from current company:
Salary: 24 LPA
Bonus: 7%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 25.6 LPA

Should I accept the counter offer from my current company and after some time try for better compensation?
Points to consider:
* My current company is product base but not a big name.
* Will I get better interview opportunity with my current company name.
* If I join PayPal its going to be 3rd company for 2.7 years of experience.
* Work in my current team is better then PayPal team.
* WLB is similar in both company.
